columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the campaign-salesperson assignment record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the marketing or sales campaign to which the salesperson is assigned.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesperson (sales representative) assigned to the campaign.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date the assignment record was created (stored as string in MM/DD/YYYY format).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the address record.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: Primary street address line (local language).

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Secondary address line (local language), e.g., building, floor or apartment.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Tertiary address information (local language), often contains city and postal code.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Quaternary address line (local language), often used for country name.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate (numeric) associated with the address (source-specific units).

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate (numeric) associated with the address (source-specific units).

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Code indicating the geocoding model type or source used to derive geospatial data.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding model or service that generated the geo attributes.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the geocoding lookup was performed for this address.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Confidence or quality score returned by the geocoding model for this address match.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Geocoding service identifier for the primary street (if provided).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Geocoding service identifier for the secondary street (if provided).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Geocoding service identifier for the locality or administrative area returned by the geocoder.

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal code string returned by the geocoding model (may be empty or service-specific).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Identifier referencing the Country table for the address's country.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string sent to the geocoding service or a normalized address search string.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model for the primary street (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number for the primary street as returned by the geocoder.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Street name text returned by the geocoding model for a secondary street (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Street number for the secondary street as returned by the geocoder.

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality or place name (city/area) returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude value returned by the geocoding model stored as text.

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude value returned by the geocoding model stored as text.

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Space-separated area hierarchy or broader area codes returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Postal (ZIP) code stored as a numeric value when available.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: Administrative district returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area or neighborhood returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Key used by downstream data-mart or ETL processes to associate this address with source data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source table name or data-mart identifier indicating the origin of the address record.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional alphanumeric data-mart key from the source system.

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character code classifying the geocode type or granular classification returned by the geocoder.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a user has manually overridden the Line1 value.

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: Primary street address line in English (if available). Used as the preferred display label.

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Secondary address line in English (apartment, building, etc.).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Tertiary address information in English, often contains city and postal code.

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Quaternary address line in English, commonly used for the country name.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Primary street name returned by the geocoder in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary street name returned by the geocoder in English.

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality or city name returned by the geocoder in English.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: Administrative district returned by the geocoding model in English.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area or neighborhood returned by the geocoding model in English.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a user has manually overridden Line1En (English address line 1).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number for the primary street as returned by the geocoder in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Street number for the secondary street as returned by the geocoder in English.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key — unique identifier for the advanced payment policy record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable policy name. Often contains Greek text and identifies the payment policy (used as display label).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer textual description of the payment policy; may be null for some records.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy record was created in the system.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account (name) that created the policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent modification to the policy record; may be null when never modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account (name) that last modified the policy record; may be null.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value that may be applied by the policy when calculating an advance amount. Stored as numeric; often null when not applicable.

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Monetary ceiling (plafon) for the policy. Decimal currency value; may be null. Unit hint in source suggests USD.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Serialized rule/expression (XAML/XML) that defines the policy logic or conditions. Large text field containing structured rule logic.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the advanced payment policy is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional textual expression or formula used to compute the advance amount when this policy applies. May be null for many records.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed advance amount (currency) defined by the policy. May be null when the policy uses percentage or a calculator. Unit hint in source suggests USD.

columns.name: AdvancedPaymentMethodID
columns.description: Reference to the advanced payment method (foreign key to dbo.AdvancedPaymentMethod.ID). Also part of the composite primary key for this mapping table.

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Reference to the sales collection (foreign key to dbo.SalesCollection.ID). Also part of the composite primary key for this mapping table.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the discount policy.

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Type/category of discount (enumerated code representing how the discount is applied).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the discount policy (may contain localized text).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer, human-readable description explaining the discount policy and its purpose.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is currently active and available for application.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Identifier or name of the user who created the discount policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the last modification to the discount policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Identifier or name of the user who last modified the discount policy record.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Discount percentage applied by this policy (stored as numeric percent value).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed monetary amount discount applied by the policy (currency; USD indicated in profiling where available).

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Logical or script expression that defines conditions when the discount policy applies (business rule text/expression).

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount should be applied per item/unit (true) or on the total (false).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle level 1 (nullable; used when bundling discounts are defined).

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle level 2 (nullable; used when bundling discounts are defined).

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle level 3 (nullable; used when bundling discounts are defined).

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Configured discount value for bundle level 4 (nullable; used when bundling discounts are defined).

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Configured discount value for other bundle types not covered by specific bundle fields (nullable).

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that can be applied by this policy (caps the effective discount).

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a supervisor is allowed to approve for this policy (nullable).

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage an area manager is allowed to approve for this policy (nullable).

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a sales manager is allowed to approve for this policy (nullable).

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a salesperson/salesman is allowed to apply (nullable).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart/local BI key used for integration with downstream reporting systems (nullable; often empty).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data mart table associated with this policy for reporting integration (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by reporting/data mart processes to link this policy (nullable).

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount value for product slot 1 (nullable; used when discounts vary by product).

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount value for product slot 2 (nullable; used when discounts vary by product).

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount value for product slot 3 (nullable; used when discounts vary by product).

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount value for product slot 4 (nullable; used when discounts vary by product).

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Product-specific discount value for other products not in slots 1-4 (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of why an advertisement was deactivated (localized text).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description or name of the advertisement sales type (e.g., ST1, ST2).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data-mart mapping; currently all values are null.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data-mart table used for mapping; column is nullable and often empty.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for data-mart mapping; nullable and frequently not populated.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business code or archived number value associated with the record; used as the primary human-readable code.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the archived number is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the record; foreign key referencing dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the archived number record; human-friendly creator identifier.

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Identifier code for the attribute (string). Uniquely identifies an attribute concept within the repository.

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Code indicating the type or category of the attribute (e.g., classification or data type).

columns.name: AttributeName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the attribute. Often localized; used as the primary display label for attribute records.

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Locale/language identifier for the attribute name (numeric or locale code, e.g., 1032).

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for a specific attribute value (distinct from the attribute concept).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Textual value for the attribute. Frequently localized and may contain descriptive or display text.

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Locale/language identifier for the attribute value (numeric or locale code).

columns.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
columns.description: Comma-separated list of active UDAC part definition codes that apply to this attribute value. May be 'None' or empty when not applicable.

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the rule condition definition. Part of the composite primary key and referenced as a foreign key to the RuleConditionDefinition table.

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the operand allowed for the rule condition. Part of the composite primary key and referenced as a foreign key to the RuleConditionOperand table.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate numeric identifier for the bank (unique).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable bank name or description (may contain localized characters).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the bank record is currently active (True/False).

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier for the activity associated with this attribute mapping. Typically relates this mapping to a specific activity or process.

columns.name: OldAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the legacy or source attribute being mapped. Used together with ActivityID to uniquely identify the mapping entry.

columns.name: NewAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the new or target attribute that the old attribute is mapped to during migration or transformation.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity associated with this mapping; links the mapping record to a specific migration activity or run.

columns.name: OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original (pre-migration) attribute value that is being mapped.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the target (post-migration) attribute value to which the old value is mapped.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity or migration run associated with this keyword-to-attribute-value mapping.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword or tag that is being mapped to an attribute value during migration.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that the keyword maps to in the target system after migration.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the original (source) record that is being merged. Acts as part of the composite key for the mapping from source to target.

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target record that the source record is merged into. Acts as part of the composite key for the mapping.

columns.name: Initial_OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original attribute value that should be replaced during migration. Part of the composite key for the replacement mapping.

columns.name: ReplaceWithAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that will replace the original value during migration. Part of the composite key for the replacement mapping.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the original keyword that should be replaced. Typically references the central Keyword master/entity.

columns.name: ReplaceWithKeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that will replace the original KeywordID. Typically references the central Keyword master/entity used as the replacement.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity for the migration step. Links to the Activities table or activity master record.

columns.name: AttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value associated with the activity in this migration step. Links to the AttributeValues table or value master list.

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the business activity (lookup key). Integer non-null surrogate or natural key used to reference activity records.

columns.name: NameGr
columns.description: Activity name in Greek (localized display name). NVARCHAR(500) Greek-collation text used for Greek-language UI and reports.

columns.name: NameEn
columns.description: Activity name in English (primary human-readable label). NVARCHAR(500) English/localized text used as the default display label for the activity.

attributes.name: GeoAreaId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the geographic area (source key)

attributes.name: Concatenate Name
attributes.description: Preferred display name for the geographic area (combined/cleaned name)

attributes.name: Name_ΟΝΟΜΑΣΤΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Nominal form of the area name (Greek - Ονομαστική)

attributes.name: Name_ΓΕΝΙΚΗ
attributes.description: Genitive form of the area name (Greek - Γενική). Field appears largely empty in samples but retained for linguistic variants.

attributes.name: specifiers
attributes.description: Additional qualifiers or specifiers for the area name (e.g., neighborhood, parish).

attributes.name: ID
attributes.description: Surrogate key for calendar row

attributes.name: CalendarDate
attributes.description: Calendar date (date portion of the datetime)

attributes.name: Year
attributes.description: Calendar year derived from CalendarDate

attributes.name: MonthName
attributes.description: Month name (e.g., January) derived from CalendarDate

attributes.name: Month
attributes.description: Month number (1-12) derived from CalendarDate

attributes.name: Day
attributes.description: Day of month derived from CalendarDate

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Text description for the date (e.g., holiday name). Greek-language values present in sample.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the star rating (string-coded numeric id, e.g., '13'..'17')

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human-readable star rating label in English (e.g., '1 star', '2 stars', ... '5 stars')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the star rating (string-coded numeric id, e.g., '13'..'17')

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human-readable star rating label in Greek (e.g., '1 αστέρι', '2 αστέρια', ... '5 αστέρια')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier / code for the transaction channel (text id).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek display name for the transaction channel (e.g., Κατάστημα, Κλήστε ραντεβού, Online Παραγγελία).

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier / code for the accommodation unit type.

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English name/label for the accommodation unit type (e.g., Hotel, Hotel Boutique, Hotel with traditional guesthouses).

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the unit type (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Unit / accommodation type name in Greek (e.g., 'Ξενoδοχείο', 'Ξενoδοχείο Boutique'). Values are Greek-language labels representing unit classifications.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the functional month value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English month name representing the functional month (sample values: 'June||', 'July||'). Note: source values include trailing delimiters ('||'); cleaning/normalization may be required for display or month-number mapping.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/string identifier for the functional month (source id values like '30','31',...)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek month name (source contains Greek month names; note source values include trailing '||')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/string identifier for the payment method (source id values like '43','44',...)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Payment method description in English (source values include trailing '||')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/code identifier for the payment method (string id from source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Localized Greek label for the payment method (e.g., credit card types, cash, etc.)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the room key count option

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English label describing the number of keys (e.g., '1 key', '2 keys')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Display text of the room keys attribute in Greek (e.g. '1 κλειδί', '2 κλειδιά'). Represents the number of keys as presented in Greek localization.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time value in HH:MM format (English localization). Useful for bucketing or ordering arrival windows.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the arrival time value (string id).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time formatted as HH:mm (Greek localization).

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23). Derived from AttributeValue for drill-down.

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59). Derived from AttributeValue for fine-grained drill-down.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the departure time value (string id).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time formatted as HH:mm (English localization).

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23). Derived from AttributeValue for drill-down.

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59). Derived from AttributeValue for fine-grained drill-down.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the departure time value (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time formatted as HH:MM (Greek locale)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the high-season month entry (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English month name indicating a high-season month. Note: source values may include trailing delimiters (e.g., 'January||').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string numeric id).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Month name in Greek. Note: source values contain trailing separators (e.g. '||'); presentation should trim delimiters when showing the month name.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string numeric id).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Month name in English. Source values include trailing separators (e.g. 'January||'); trim delimiters for display and analysis.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount recorded for this payment method across all records. Amount has 3 decimal precision in source but is typically presented to 2 decimals.

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Total number of payment method records (rows) in the fact.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount for records in this fact.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Smallest recorded payment amount.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Largest recorded payment amount.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers associated with these payment records. Useful to identify how many unique receipts are represented.

measures.name: PolicyAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values. Note: PolicyAmount is almost entirely null in the current data (very high null rate), so this measure will typically be null/zero.

measures.name: PercentWithCreditCardInstallments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardInstallments IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of payment records that have CreditCardInstallments populated. Current data shows a 100% null rate for this column, so this will normally be 0%.

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (row count).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of Amount for payments. Amount is stored with 3 decimal precision; presented as currency.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average payment Amount per record (ignores NULL Amount values).

measures.name: PaymentsWithAmount
measures.description: Count of payment records that have a non-null Amount.

measures.name: PolicyAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount where present (may be NULL for many rows).

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments for credit card payments (NULLs ignored).

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceipts
measures.description: Count of distinct SystemReceiptNumber values observed in this set (useful when system receipts are populated).

measures.name: Advertisement Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (rows) in the fact.

measures.name: Total Price (Gross)
measures.description: Sum of the listed price for all advertisements (gross).

measures.name: Total Discount
measures.description: Sum of all discounts applied to advertisement prices.

measures.name: Total Rules Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by rules to advertisements.

measures.name: Total Altered Amount
measures.description: Sum of manually altered amounts (where present). Nulls treated as zero.

measures.name: Net Revenue (approx)
measures.description: Approximate net revenue per advertisement = gross price minus discounts and altered amounts. (Does not include all possible fee/one-time adjustments.)

measures.name: Average Price
measures.description: Average of Price across advertisements (ignores NULLs).

measures.name: Average Discount Percent
measures.expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(SUM(Price),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Discount) / NULLIF(SUM(Price),0) END
measures.description: Total discount as a percent of total price. Null when total price is zero.

measures.name: Sum Payment Discount
measures.description: Sum of payment-specific discounts (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Sum Product Discount
measures.description: Sum of product-level discounts (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Sum Bundle Discount
measures.description: Sum of bundle discounts (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Total Budget Amount
measures.description: Sum of BudgetAmount across advertisements (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Total One-Time Amount
measures.description: Sum of one-time charges associated with advertisements.

measures.name: Total Extra Fee Amount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees associated with advertisements.

measures.name: Total One-Time Amount After Discount
measures.description: Sum of one-time charges after discounts have been applied.

measures.name: Total Extra Fee After Discount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after discounts.

measures.name: Actual Spent Budget
measures.description: Sum of actual spent budget reported for advertisements (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Total Extra Fee After CC
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after credit-card adjustments.

measures.name: Total Altered PPC After CC
measures.description: Sum of altered pay-per-click amounts after credit-card adjustments.

measures.name: Sum Months
measures.description: Sum of the Months field (useful for subscription duration aggregation). Nulls treated as zero.

measures.name: Sum Completed Changes
measures.description: Sum of completed changes indicator (currently appears to be 0 for most rows).

measures.name: Deposit Count
measures.description: Total number of deposit records (rows) in the detail table.

measures.name: Distinct Deposit Numbers
measures.description: Count of unique BankDepositNumber values (distinct deposit identifiers).

measures.name: Banks Represented
measures.description: Number of distinct banks referenced in these deposit records.

measures.name: Average Days Since Deposit
measures.description: Average number of days from each deposit date to today (useful for aging analyses).

measures.name: Average Daily Deposits
measures.description: Average number of deposit records per calendar day over the selected period.

default_filters.description: Default to the last 12 months of deposits

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of batch action history records (rows).

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in this table.

measures.name: DistinctActionTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct batch action type codes observed.

measures.name: TotalRowsAffected
measures.description: Sum of RowsAffected across actions — total rows impacted by recorded actions.

measures.name: AverageRowsAffected
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per recorded action.

measures.name: MinRowsAffected
measures.description: Minimum RowsAffected value observed.

measures.name: MaxRowsAffected
measures.description: Maximum RowsAffected value observed.

measures.name: SuccessfulActions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions recorded with Status = 1 (interpreted as success).

measures.name: FailedActions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions recorded with Status = 0 (interpreted as failure).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of actions that were successful (Status = 1).

measures.name: TextPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Text IS NOT NULL AND LEN(Text) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records that contain non-empty Text (log/message) content.

measures.name: TotalEvents
measures.description: Total number of extraction history records (events).

measures.name: LatestEventTime
measures.description: Most recent event timestamp for the selected context.

measures.name: Events_Type_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Type = 0. Use Type dimension for human-friendly labels.

measures.name: Events_Type_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Type = 1. Use Type dimension for human-friendly labels.

measures.name: Events_Type_2
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Type = 2. Use Type dimension for human-friendly labels.

measures.name: Events_Status_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Status = 0. Verify status code semantics (e.g., success/failure) in source system.

measures.name: Events_Status_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of events with Status = 1. Verify status code semantics (e.g., success/failure) in source system.

measures.name: SuccessRate_Assuming_Status0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of events where Status = 0. This measure assumes Status = 0 corresponds to a 'successful' outcome — confirm with system documentation before using this as definitive success rate.

notes: Text contains free-form messages and templates (NVARCHAR). Consider building a small lookup/dimension if specific message parsing is required.
Type and Status are integer codes. Create Type and Status dimensions (id -> label) for clearer reporting.
Sample values indicate many Status = 0; confirm code meanings before treating Status=0 as success.
